static count_by_ip ($the_ip)
 Returns the count of blocked visits for the desired IP address. An IP address.

Detailed Description

Model class that represents individual visits from blocked IP addresses.

You may wonder why having visits from blocked IPs logged at all? We will use those to evaluate the 'conduct' of a blocked IP and eventually decide to remove it from the blacklist.
